p.k: New. An intimate profile of José Carreras, the Spanish tenor who achieved worldwide fame with his performances as one of the Three Tenors

Competition in which budding artists are challenged to paint a scene in four hours
Archeological Landscape In a single picture, the contestants must capture the spirit and historical significance of one of Italy's most famous sites: Ostia Antica
Lamb to the Slaughter When Mary kills her husband with a frozen leg of lamb, she must think quickly to hide the evidence
The Landlady When a young man arrives in Bath, he is shocked to find his seemingly charming landlady has a dark side

n.u: Gail Rebuck: The South Bank Show

p.n: Gail Rebuck: The South Bank Show (5)
p.k: Melvyn Bragg talks to Gail Rebuck. As one of the most influential figures in British publishing she was awarded a CBE in 2000 and made a Dame in 2009

Violin maestro Andre Rieu hosts a very special wedding party, thrilling the crowd with a host of celebratory songs
This biographical musical film directed by Gary Weis intertwines 1976 concert footage with interviews with the band, along with Blues Brothers Dan Aykroyd and John Belushi

p.n: New: John Frankenheimer: The Directors III (6)
p.k: New. A look at the life and career of the award-winning director behind movies such as The Manchurian Candidate, Birdman of Alcatraz, The Train and Ronin

p.n: Chaplin: The Birth Of The Tramp
p.k: A fascinating look beyond the toothbrush moustache, derby hat, walking cane and splayed feet to uncover the remarkable rise of Charlie Chaplin

p.n: Mario Lanza: The Best Of Everything
p.k: A biographical portrait of Mario Lanza, the tenor and movie star who rose to fame in the 50s and paved the way for the likes of José Carreras and Plácido Domingo

This moving documentary, featuring friends, family and well-known fans, tells the story of how East End boy Mark Feld became T. Rex frontman and glam-rock icon Marc Bolan
New. Film chronicling the life of rock star Joan Jett, from founding The Runaways as an ambitious teenager to her evolution into the icon and activist she is today
